languages.text: {n}Блюстительница опускает голову.{/n} "Наша честь испятнана, мы подвели наших предшественников и стыдимся того, сколь глупы и слабы оказались, Лорд-капитан".
{n}The Master-at-Arms lowers her head.{/n} "Our honour is sullied. We have failed our forebears. Our ineptitude and weakness are shameful, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Блюстительница опускает голову.{/n} "Наша честь испятнана, мы подвели наших предшественников и стыдимся того, сколь глупы и слабы оказались, Лорд-капитан".

{n}The Master-at-Arms lowers her head.{/n} "Our honour is sullied. We have failed our forebears. Our ineptitude and weakness are shameful, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}La capitaine d'armes baisse la tête.{/n} « Notre honneur est à jamais souillé. Nous avons failli à nos ancêtres. Notre incompétence et notre faiblesse nous plongent dans la honte et le désarroi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms lowers her head.{/n} "Our honour is sullied. We have failed our forebears. Our ineptitude and weakness are shameful, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}La capitaine d'armes baisse la tête.{/n} « Notre honneur est à jamais souillé. Nous avons failli à nos ancêtres. Notre incompétence et notre faiblesse nous plongent dans la honte et le désarroi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}La maestra de armas agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Nuestro honor está mancillado. Hemos fallado a nuestros antecesores. Nuestra ineptitud y debilidad son una vergüenza, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms lowers her head.{/n} "Our honour is sullied. We have failed our forebears. Our ineptitude and weakness are shameful, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de armas agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Nuestro honor está mancillado. Hemos fallado a nuestros antecesores. Nuestra ineptitud y debilidad son una vergüenza, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}戒律大师低下了头。{/n}“我们玷污了我们的名誉，辜负了我们的先祖。我为我们的无能与软弱感到羞愧，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms lowers her head.{/n} "Our honour is sullied. We have failed our forebears. Our ineptitude and weakness are shameful, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}戒律大师低下了头。{/n}“我们玷污了我们的名誉，辜负了我们的先祖。我为我们的无能与软弱感到羞愧，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは頭を下げた。{/n}「我々の名誉は汚された。我々は先祖を裏切った。我々の無能と弱さは恥ずべきものです、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms lowers her head.{/n} "Our honour is sullied. We have failed our forebears. Our ineptitude and weakness are shameful, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは頭を下げた。{/n}「我々の名誉は汚された。我々は先祖を裏切った。我々の無能と弱さは恥ずべきものです、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms neigt den Kopf.{/n} "Unsere Ehre ist besudelt. Wir haben unsere Ahnen im Stich gelassen. Unsere Unfähigkeit und Schwäche sind schändlich, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms lowers her head.{/n} "Our honour is sullied. We have failed our forebears. Our ineptitude and weakness are shameful, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms neigt den Kopf.{/n} "Unsere Ehre ist besudelt. Wir haben unsere Ahnen im Stich gelassen. Unsere Unfähigkeit und Schwäche sind schändlich, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Silahtar başını eğiyor.{/n} "Onurumuz lekelendi. Atalarımızı utandırdık. Beceriksizliğimizden ve zayıflığımızdan utanç duyuyoruz Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms lowers her head.{/n} "Our honour is sullied. We have failed our forebears. Our ineptitude and weakness are shameful, Lord Captain."
